#### Practical information

+ Talks are given in the __Amphithéâtre Tisserand__, the workshops in __Salle 30__ and __Salle 31__. People who have pre-registered for the workshops will be given priority.

+ Food will be served in the __Salle du Centenaire__. Everything is vegetarian-friendly.

+ You can use the __#satRdayParis__ hashtag, and follow us on __@satrdayparis__.


+ Wifi: __eduroam is available for academics__. Others can use the __"AgroParisTech Visiteurs"__, with the password _VHcwCp8XJ5S_. Please note that this network only allow http/https, and no ssh.
